name: places/ChIJawhX8ORYwokRlJ3vcsE-ETY
adrFormatAddress: 1105 1st Ave., New York, NY 10022-8701, USA

originalText.text:
We are so grateful Shelby matched my new puppy with Doug for fast track training. It went so well we are in the middle of a 10 pack, and Roo is really putting things together at another level.   Doug doesn't just train Roo, but me too!  He is reliable, responsive, thorough, and we are so grateful he is flexible with our training needs. Most importantly, Roo loves and trusts Doug (so do I)!  We recently  attended  a puppy play class with Shelby who finally got to meet Roo. She thought  Roo was adorable (of course), and so well adjusted.  She asked how  Roo was doing outside etc and remarked how she didn't seem anxious. I said she loves outside.  I don't know what you are talking about she's fearless and fun!  I must've looked at her as if she had two heads, and then I remembered my initial outreach to Shelby for immediate help.  Bottom line, we have done so much amazing work with Doug that I totally forgot the reason we signed up with Doug for fast track. Shelby and Doug understood the urgency I
in training her during her imprint period to set her up for success.  I am blessed for Shelby training my last dog, Scout (Rip) as a puppy (and me as a first time owner).  Scout  had a great life with her training foundation, and this time around is even better. Not only is Doug an amazing trainer, he has become like family.. I cannot wait to train with him for Good Citizen, and for Roo to become a therapy dog.  Based on the work we do together, I know down the road she is the perfect recipe for a therapy dog, lifting patients moods in a hospital setting.

Amy L

originalText.text:
I can't say enough about Shelby and her wonderful company.  She has been the best human to  ever happen to my dog Tucker.  She trained him as a puppy and he is the dog he is today because of her patience and oversight. He was attacked and seriously injured by a dog and needed to recover not only physically but emtionally.  He became afraid of just about anything and
his fearfulness was heartbreaking to witness.  Worse, the same dog tried to hurt him a few weeks ago, taking him in her mouth and shaking him.  Shelby was there to guide Tucker back to his true self both times and she remains in his life today, always there to answer questions or concerns.  She is truly Tucker's guardian angel!  Beyond that, his connection to her is amazing.  She gave him a toy when he was a puppy and it is stillhis most coveted belonging.
I think that says it all!

originalText.text: I worked with Laura to help with my dog's separation anxiety and she has changed both of our lives! I didn't realize just how stressed we both were, and now I feel able to leave her alone knowing that she will be calm. The virtual aspect allowed me to do sessions from anywhere, and it really gave Laura a realistic perspective of how my dog would reacts in her environment when I leave, which you wouldn't get if this happened in-person at a facility. Laura was also very responsive to all my questions both during sessions and over email. Can't recommend Laura and this company enough!

originalText.text: My dog and I have taken 3 group classes with Shelby Semel (Accelerated Basic Obedience, Loose Leash Walking, and Impulse Control) and they've all been nothing short of amazing.  We've had trainer Frankie for all of our classes and she's great at personalizing each class and answering all my questions, even over email.  My dog, Oliver, is obsessed with Frankie and I love that the classes are held in public places (the distractions help Oliver learn in all environments and they help me learn how to redirect him).  Training with Shelby Semel has been fun, easy, and incredibly affordable. When I adopted Oliver he was scared and now 10 months later he is well behaved and well adjusted.  We look forward to going to more training classes!

originalText.text: Our family has had an amazing experience with Shelby Semel Dog Training. We have taken group classes as well as private training with our trainer Victoria. Our goldendoodle Percy is quite the personality, and absolutely loves Victoria! We have used several board and train opportunities with Victoria and it's honestly been the best money we've ever spent. Percy is always excited to go off to "camp" with Victoria! Shelby is very responsive to questions and providing recommendations that suit your dogs current training ability for optimal progress. Victoria is incredibly communicative and has been so helpful getting us through Percy's first year in our home! (She started working with him at 10 weeks!) Thanks so much!
